channel.title: Logins / Users
channel.description:
OK so i have a question, ive asked now three times and no one is yet to answer this... (Im brand new to hosting of RS private servers- our gaming community has a nice dedicated box we use for other game servers, looking to expand to runescape)
how.. do you manage users/create users.
i see a "character" folder, are they based off .txt's for each user? or based off of a mySQL database?

item.title: Logins / Users

item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

Erm it depends on the source you use you need a ceartin client to play it right >.>

item.title: Logins / Users
item.dc:creator: @TheJMan TheJMan
item.description:
@TheJMan wrote:

Thanks man, id rep if i could.
hey, how does one go about getting a webclient, i was looking for them on this forum, didnt see any.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2009, 11:13:23 am[/size][hr]For some reason, if i go to “http://www.moparisthebest.com/index.php”
and try to play with there web-client, it also just closes my IExplorer. so im not sure if its my PC or not, but when i launched my “PwnScape” client and connected to my “PwnScape” server, half the doors wouldnt open, and there was missing walls just “skulls”… im not sure if that platform just has bugs, or if it is my java.

Read full topic

@noobspure50 wrote:

no in the client u load it itle say log in just use any random name \ pass u want and itle add it to your char files then u can edit them in there (IF U WANT U SHOULDENT UNLESS U WANT TO CHANGE POSITIONS) if you want to make yourself the owner open your char files after u cre8 an account and log out so it saved it then put player rights as 3
